CatDescriptText: Miss Emma Brown, 3303 Iowa Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 13, 1958, pg. 2 with question: �What do you think of young men or boys who process their hair? Do you think it improves their appearance or not?� answer reads: �No, I don�t think that it does improve the appearance.  It�s all right for the older men, but i don�t like it for the younger boys.  It seems to make them look too mannish.�
